text: Urban Christian Ahlin (; born 13 November 1964) is a Swedish Social Democratic Party politician. He was Speaker of the Riksdag from September 2014 to September 2018. He was a Member of the Riksdag (MP) for the Västra Götaland County East constituency from 1994 to 2018. In 2023, he became the Ambassador of Sweden to the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Riksdag Category:Ambassadors to Canada Category:Ambassadors to the United States
title: Urban Ahlin
